patthana8.54:1.1: Nakilesañceva naasaṅkiliṭṭhañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakileso ceva naasaṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.54:2.1: Naasaṅkiliṭṭhañceva nano ca kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭho ceva nano ca kileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.54:3.1: Nakilesañceva naasaṅkiliṭṭhañca naasaṅkiliṭṭhañceva nano ca kilesañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakileso ceva naasaṅkiliṭṭho ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
